Name: DNL Dedicated Server Tool
About the game: This is a tool designed to help players set up and maintain their own dedicated private server for Dark and Light, simplifying the process by directly managing the SteamCMD tool and any server installations and updates. Features Set up and maintain your own Dark and Light Private Server. Simple UI with a variety of tools to help configure your server. Easy to update to align with the most up-to-date Dark and Light version. Quickly track server status and control server state.
